pages.text: $(li)Pipes can transport items but cannot extract them from inventories.$(br)$(li)They can move items upwards, so they can be an easy solution instead of using Droppers or Dispensers.
$(li)They have to be directed connected with the output tube of a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper)Hopper$(/l) and other container, like a chest.
